globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:;
